channel.title: Npc emotes?
channel.description:
I know how to add death emote, But what about attack emotes?
It looks like I have to add prayer protect from that npc to use the emotes?
Emotes I want to add.:
Agrith-Na-Na
3498 = stand 3499 = walk 3500 = block 3501 = atk 3502 = magic atk 3503 = dead

item.title: Npc emotes?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

[quote="`ExiledScape, post:3, topic:278159"][quote author=manmanner link=topic=367143.msg2781802#msg2781802 date=1242026504]
just write the emotes
and the plr.ProtSomething is the players protect
i have a little of this problem too
but for me its walk and stand emotes
[/quote]

go into more detail, please[/quote]
yes
you need protection enabled
else the npc hits thru your prayer no matter what=P
and i cant find the npc walk/stand anim methods

Read full topic
